title: Olena Zelenska - Wikipedia
snippet: Olena Volodymyrivna Zelenska (née Kyiashko; born 6 February 1978) is a Ukrainian screenwriter who has served as First Lady of Ukraine since 2019, as the wife of President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: President's wife news — Official web site of the President of Ukraine
snippet: News about President's wife Olena Zelenska on Official web site of the President of Ukraine

title: Meet Olena Zelenska, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's wife: Their high-school love story - The Times of India
snippet: In 2023, Olena Zelenska was named in the 100 Most Influential People of 2023 by TIME. After dating for a few years, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Olena Zelenska married on September 6, 2003.

title: Who Is Olena Zelenska? Meet President, Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Wife Who Is The First Lady Of Ukraine
snippet: The Ukrainian President, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, is married to Olena Zelenska, who is the First Lady of Ukraine. The couple got married on September 6, 2003, and are currently parents of two children, a son named Kyrylo and a daughter named Oleksandra.

title: Olena Zelenska thanks other first ladies for supporting Ukraine | Ukraine | The Guardian
snippet: The wife of the Ukrainian president, Vlodymyr Zelenskiy, has thanked France’s first lady, Brigitte Macron, and other leaders’ wives for helping to ensure sick children reached safety.
